Subject: A better life is possible!
MessageBody: I hope this message finds any of the Root community members. We know what you're going through there. We know what they tell you. Deep inside, you know that it's a wall of lies, and always have been. Deep inside, you know that you donâ€™t deserve this. Even though it seems so far away, your salvation isn't out of your reach. Hang in there, don't lose your fire!
